data_description.base: Using another base currency than USD requires a [paid plan]({signup}).

deprecated_yaml.description:
Configuring Open Exchange Rates using YAML is being removed.

Your existing YAML configuration has been imported into the UI automatically.

Remove the Open Exchange Rates YAML configuration from your configuration.yaml file and restart Home Assistant to fix this issue.
deprecated_yaml.title: The Open Exchange Rates YAML configuration is being removed
